sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>dirt</radical> under a <radical>cliff</radical> is going to be under a lot of <kanji>pressure</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine being down there with all that dirt. Imagine feeling the pressure closing in around you. It's so hard to breathe... h... help!
readingMnemonic: The dirt being crushed under this <kanji>pressure</kanji> can't help but react by sneezing out, "<reading>Achoo</reading> (<ja>あつ</ja>)!" This sneeze-inducing pressure probably has something to do with where earthquakes come from.
readingInfo: Imagine you're the dirt being pressed from every direction, the pressure so strong, and it squeezes an ACHOO right out of you.
